h2_title: Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide
content: When the queen of spiders finally falls to your assault, she'll beat a hasty retreat to return to wherever she's hidden the Sage's Relic. You'll need to follow quickly, because a literal spider army will appear to give chase!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Spider.md', within the main section titled 'Violet Spider', specifically from the subsection 'Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the queen of spiders finally falls to your assault, she'll beat a hasty retreat to return to wherever she's hidden the Sage's Relic. You'll need to follow quickly, because a literal spider army will appear to give chase!
